CustomField.description: Checked when the claim was processed the year after it was submitted by the contractor.
CustomField.formula:
OR( AND(ISBLANK(Date_Sent_to_IMT__c), ISBLANK(Date_Approved_and_Check_Processed__c), ISBLANK(Final_Approval_On__c), ISBLANK(Final_Rejection_On__c), TEXT(Internal_Status__c) <> "Draft", Hidden_Field_Claim_Yearly_Cut_Off_Date__c < $CustomMetadata.Loyalty_Coop_Cut_Off_Date__mdt.Coop_Cut_Off_Date.Coop_Cut_Off_Date__c),
Hidden_Field_Claim_Yearly_Cut_Off_Date__c < Date_Sent_to_IMT__c , Hidden_Field_Claim_Yearly_Cut_Off_Date__c < Date_Approved_and_Check_Processed__c , Hidden_Field_Claim_Yearly_Cut_Off_Date__c < Final_Approval_On__c , Hidden_Field_Claim_Yearly_Cut_Off_Date__c < Final_Rejection_On__c )
CustomField.label: PRIOR YEAR CLAIM
